meanings.definition: The activity of riding on ocean waves on a surfboard.
meanings.sent1: During summer vacation, we watched the surfings at the beach.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys the thrill of surfings in the early morning.
meanings.sent3: The surfings competition had everyone cheering for their favorite surfers.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the waves were like a graceful dance during surfings.
meanings.sent5: The sound of crashing waves accompanied the surfings at sunset.

meanings.definition: The act of browsing the internet casually and randomly.
meanings.sent1: I lost track of time while doing some surfings online.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours doing surfings on various websites.
meanings.sent3: His surfings led him to discover a new recipe for banana bread.
meanings.sent4: In the vast sea of information, her surfings were like navigating a maze.
meanings.sent5: The late-night surfings resulted in finding a great deal on a new laptop.
